content: #18583 (+367 âˆ’288) is a refactor that ultimately amounts to replacing [inner_product_space K V] with [normed_add_comm_group V] [inner_product_space K V]. I've listed the motivations in the PR description. I've made a weak attempt to squash the history into atomic (working) commits to squeeze review, though most of the changes have to happen all at once.
This now has two approvals, but both are requesting additional consensus on the general idea.
